name: Bibo (Blue Peanuts, Xilurus)
description:
Bibo is a rogue-like action game where you fight hoards of monsters with your AI friend "Bibo".  Battle with different enemies with a variety of attack patterns and engage on a Boss battle to complete your mission and conquer your  first planet.

Controls: WASD: Move Space: Dash Space: Dash to Bibo to Combine (You are immune when inside Bibo) Left Click: Attack Made By:

Xilurus and Blue Peanuts
